issues.description: The problem statement (and UML diagram) specifies getTotalNumberOfStudents() should return an int, but the solution implements it as returning a custom StudentCount object. This introduces an unexpected class (StudentCount) not mentioned in the instructions or template and prevents students from following the intended signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the solution with the specification by changing the method signature to public int getTotalNumberOfStudents() and return the sum of guest and inscribed students directly as an int. Remove or refactor the StudentCount class if it is not needed.
